item.title: Lauper IT-Consulting
item.description: Some tips on how to stay current with technology. See links for more informations. Release notes Read the release notes of libraries and 3rd party products you use. They are a good source for new features that you can use. You might be supprised how often libraries are just updated to new versions without making use of new features. Projects Monitor what projects in your company do and try to leverage usefull innovations to other projects.

item.title: Lauper IT-Consulting
item.description: Support development team on Smalltalk to Java migration Support a Java development team based in Switzerland and Vietnam migrating a Smalltalk based business application to Java. Created specifications for Java developers in Vietnam, rewrote Smalltalk code to Java using Spring Data and Spring REST. Technologies: IntelliJ, Docker, Spring Boot, Spring Data, Spring REST, JPA/Hibernate
